data.message: This is definitely going to be a "pay it forward" moment/movement.  Thank you FB.  Nice job

replies.message: Hi Kathleen. Thanks for the positive feedback! We really appreciate it. -Tenaya
Good to see these young men doing positive things. They both get it and will do well.

With our country so deeply divided and all the depressing news that we are battered with every day...this is great a breath of fresh air and a reminder that there ARE people out there that are willing to go the extra mile to help one another. Thank you FB for  spot lighting this story and THANK YOU, Febin, for lighting a candle and inspiring others to let their candles shine.
WHAT HE SAID!❤You Said it Perfectly Dom Mastrianno😀
